description.name: User can add a reference to a file in bibtex-format

scenario.name: user can add an article reference by entering required information

given.name: commands Create new reference and Article are selected

when.name: required and optional article reference information is entered

then.name: a new article reference has been added

scenario.name: user can add a book reference by giving required information

given.name: commands Create new reference and book are selected

when.name: required book reference information is entered

then.name: a new book reference has been added

scenario.name: user can add a inproceedings reference by giving required information

given.name: commands Create new reference and inproceedings are selected

when.name: required and optional inproceedings reference information is entered

then.name: a new inproceedings reference has been added

scenario.name: user can add an several references by giving required information

given.name: commands Create new reference and reference type are selected

when.name: required article reference information is entered

then.name: more than one references have been added

scenario.name: user can add a reference by giving required information and modify the information afterwards

given.name: reference has been added and command Choose existing reference to modify is selected

when.name: citation key of the reference and valid information is entered
